skills: Supervising permitted storage facility's hazardous waste, Corona waste operations and activities, Conducting annual internal audits, Overseeing daily operational activities, Monitoring federal and local environmental regulations, Upgrading operational by ensuring environmental program objectives are maintained, Developing Environmental Procedures and Environmental Policies, Providing project manager with support and help by managing all areas of daily operational activity, Use of safe and effective collection methods, Inspecting incoming waste streams for recyclables materials, Directing sorting, handling and recycling operations, Responding to and investigating accidents involving hazardous materials, Reviewing daily, weekly, monthly, and annual reports, Reviewing efficiency of waste management processing techniques, Performing internal audits, Maintaining all financial records, Handling customer inquiries, resolving customer complaints, Reviewing employee performance and issuing performance reports, Reviewing reports and holding staff meetings to discuss findings, Oversight of all site operations, Preparing collection route schedules, Responding to emergencies, Ensuring that safety standards were followed, Coordinating with Abu Dhabi authorities to obtain NOC’s, Site and maintenance supervision to ensure compliance with agreed specifications, Maintaining proper day to day documentation of Site Works, Carrying out a technical assessment of the necessary maintenance/rehabilitation work, Following up on project field activities and ensure compliance with quality standards and accountability,
